main event: A white object was observed at a constant bearing, appearing to hover, and then disappearing to the south. It was possibly a balloon or aircraft in normal operation.
interesting points: The object was observed on ground radar and visually.
The observation lasted for about 15 minutes.
A lieutenant from the Virginia National Guard reported observing a bright object passing from west to east during the same time period, which tends to confirm the initial sighting.
The weather conditions were reported, including wind speed and direction at various altitudes.
The sighting was reported to the 43rd Fighter Interceptor Squadron and Norfolk Search Control, who stated the object could have been a satellite passing over.
